revised_title: Calculation of Coefficient of Mutual Induction and Electromagnetic Force Between Helical Current and Coaxial Circular Cylindrical Current Sheet
tldr: The authors present a method to calculate the coefficient of mutual induction between a circle and a coaxial helix, and the electromagnetic force between a helical current and a uniform coaxial circular cylindrical current sheet. They also discuss the application of this method in measuring dielectric constants using an experimental setup.
